xqdoc:description.p: This library module provides data conversion functions for processing calendar dates, temporal values, currency values, units of measurement, location names and postal addresses.
The logic contained in this module is not specific to any particular XQuery implementation.
The key to be used when accessing the White Pages Web service
Uses a White-pages Web service to discover information about a given name, returning a sequence of strings for the phone numbers associated to the name.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $name The name of person or organization.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A sequence of strings for the phone numbers associated to the name.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: conversion:phone-from-user
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %an:nondeterministic function conversion:phone-from-user($name as xs:string) as xs:string*

xqdoc:description.p: Uses a White-pages Web service to discover information about a given name, returning a sequence of strings for the addresses associated to the name.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $name The name of person or organization.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A sequence of strings for the addresses associated to the name.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: conversion:address-from-user
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %an:nondeterministic function conversion:address-from-user($name as xs:string) as xs:string*

xqdoc:description.p: Uses a White-pages Web service to discover information about a given phone number, returning a sequence of strings for the name associated to the phone number.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $phone-number A string with 10 digits corresponding to the phone number.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A sequence of strings for the person or organization's name associated to the phone number.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: conversion:user-from-phone
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %an:nondeterministic function conversion:user-from-phone($phone-number as xs:string) as xs:string*

xqdoc:description.p: Uses a White-pages Web service to discover information about a given phone number, returning a string for the address associated to the phone number.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $phone-number A string with 10 digits corresponding to the phone number.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A string for the addresses associated to the phone number.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: conversion:address-from-phone
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %an:nondeterministic function conversion:address-from-phone($phone-number as xs:string) as xs:string*

xqdoc:description.p: Uses a White-pages Web service to discover information about a given address, returning a sequence of strings for the names associated to the address.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $address A string corresponding to the address (ex: 5655 E Gaskill Rd, Willcox, AZ, US).
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A sequence of strings for the person or organization's names associated to the address.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: conversion:user-from-address
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %an:nondeterministic function conversion:user-from-address($address as xs:string) as xs:string*

xqdoc:description.p: Uses a White-pages Web service to discover information about a given address, returning a sequence of strings for the phone number associated to the address.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $address A string corresponding to the address (ex: 5655 E Gaskill Rd, Willcox, AZ, US).
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A sequence of strings for the phone number or organization's names associated to the address.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: conversion:phone-from-address
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %an:nondeterministic function conversion:phone-from-address($address as xs:string) as xs:string*

xqdoc:description.p: Conversion function for units of measurement, acting as a wrapper over the CuppaIT WebService.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $v The amount we wish to convert.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The value resulting from the conversion

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: conversion:unit-convert
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %an:nondeterministic function conversion:unit-convert($v as xs:double, $t as xs:string, $m1 as xs:string, $m2 as xs:string) as xs:double

xqdoc:description.p: Placename to geospatial coordinates converter, acting as a wrapper over the Yahoo! geocoder service.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $q A sequence of strings corresponding to the different components (e.g., street, city, country, etc.) of the place name.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The pair of latitude and longitude coordinates associated with the input address.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: conversion:geocode-from-address
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %an:nondeterministic function conversion:geocode-from-address($q as xs:string*) as xs:double*

xqdoc:description.p: Geospatial coordinates to placename converter, acting as a wrapper over the Yahoo! reverse geocoder service.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The sequence of strings corresponding to the different components (e.g., street, city, country, etc.) of the place name that corresponds to the input geospatial coordinates.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: conversion:address-from-geocode
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %an:nondeterministic function conversion:address-from-geocode($lat as xs:double, $lon as xs:double) as xs:string*

xqdoc:description.p: Currency conversion function, acting as a wrapper over the WebService from the European Central Bank.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $v The amount we wish to convert.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The value resulting from the conversion.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: conversion:NOTSUPPORTED if the date, the source currency type or the target currency type are not known to the service.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: conversion:currency-convert
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %an:nondeterministic function conversion:currency-convert($v as xs:double, $m1 as xs:string, $m2 as xs:string, $date as xs:string) as xs:double

xqdoc:description.p: Uses a whois service to discover information about a given domain name, returning a sequence of strings for the phone numbers associated to the name.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return:
A sequence of strings for the phone numbers associated to the domain name.
Attention : This function is still not implemented.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: conversion:phone-from-domain
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function conversion:phone-from-domain($domain as xs:string) as xs:string*

xqdoc:description.p: Uses a whois service to discover information about a given domain name, returning a sequence of strings for the addresses associated to the name.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return:
A sequence of strings for the addresses associated to the domain name.
Attention : This function is still not implemented.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: conversion:address-from-domain
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function conversion:address-from-domain($domain as xs:string) as xs:string*

xqdoc:description.p: Uses a whois service to discover information about a given domain name, returning a sequence of strings for the person or organization names associated to the name.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return:
A sequence of strings for the person or organization names associated to the domain name.
Attention : This function is still not implemented.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: conversion:name-from-domain
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function conversion:name-from-domain($domain as xs:string) as xs:string*
